# device

**Instance Property**

The GPU device that creates the command queue.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

The command queue can submit work only to the GPU the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance represents.

## Identifying the command queue

- **label**: An optional name that can help you identify the command queue.

items.description: An optional name that can help you identify the command queue.
items.name: label
